# Contributing

We are laser-focused on gut-punch A: perfect, instant, offline memory of your own files.

Fastest path to merge:
- If your PR makes the demo faster, more accurate, or more memory-efficient, itâ€™s in-scope.
- Keep `blueprint/README.md` and `blueprint/docs/goni-story.md` / `blueprint/docs/goni-whitepaper.md` free of concrete specs; put numbers in `blueprint/hardware/90-decisions.md`, `blueprint/software/90-decisions.md`, or `blueprint/prototype/**` (with dates, seeds, and **valid until**).
- Tightening constraints? Update `blueprint/hardware/10-requirements.md` or `blueprint/software/90-decisions.md` with evidence (photo, measurement, benchmark) and a **valid until** line.

Before opening a PR, skim `blueprint/docs/goni-agility-rules.md` and complete the PR checklist in `blueprint/.github/pull_request_template.md`.
